tips: 🪟 Press Win + X for a quick admin menu.
🧹 Clean up junk with cleanmgr from Run (Win + R).
🛠 Launch Resource Monitor: resmon in Run dialog.
🔍 Task Manager shortcut: Ctrl + Shift + Esc.
🧰 Disable startup programs via Task Manager > Startup.
🔒 Lock your PC: Win + L.
💽 Check disk health: open CMD and run chkdsk /f.
📡 Reset network: netsh winsock reset in CMD.
📁 Hidden files? Use Ctrl + H in File Explorer.
🖥️ Switch displays: Win + P.
📊 View system info: msinfo32.
📦 App crash? Try Reliability Monitor from Start.
📌 Pin folders to Quick Access by right-click > Pin.
🗂 Enable file extensions: View > Show > File name extensions.
🎯 Use Windows Defender Offline for deep malware scan.
🧪 Use sfc /scannow in CMD to repair system files.
🌐 Clear DNS cache: ipconfig /flushdns.
🖨️ Troubleshoot printer: control printers.
🛡️ Windows Security dashboard: Start > Windows Security.
🧼 Free up space: Settings > Storage > Cleanup recommendations.
